description: PP files are saved in an XML format and can be viewed with a text editor. They are saved to the /​data/​pocketphysics/​sketches/​ directory on a Nintendo DS card.
NOTE: Pocket Physics is distributed as a .NDS file and is run on a Nintendo DS.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .pp file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: PP file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
